Article.Title: Gameloft give a buy-one-get-one-free offer to Epic 4G and Evo 4G owners
Article.Content: If you own either a Sprint Epic 4G or Evo 4G, and love to game (not necessarily as much as this guy) then you should listen up, as Gameloft are now offering a buy-one-get-one-free deal for Sprint customers. Announced on their blog today, Gameloft are offering the deal throughout the holidays on the following titles: Asphalt 5 HD Assassin’s Creed – Altaïr’s Chronicles HD Dungeon Hunter HD Gangstar: West Coast Hustle HD Hero of Sparta HD Let’s Golf! HD Modern Combat: Sandstorm HD N.O.V.A. Near Orbit Vanguard Alliance HD Tom Clancy’s H.A.W.X HD UNO HD To get the offer, you need to follow these steps: Connect through 3G. Please note WiFi and 4G will not work. Using your HTC EVO or Samsung EPIC phone, check into the Sprint Zone Within the Sprint Zone, click through to our Gameloft app (this can be found under “Suggested Apps”): http://wapshop.gameloft.com/us/sprintchannel/hdplus You’ll see the “Buy One, Get One Free” promotional banner. Click to get the deal. Simple enough, eh? [via Android Police]
